title: Liquidity Mining rewards
body:
The current mining program rewards liquidity providers with different percentage based on the token a pool is paired with.
Every day a number of tokens are allocated to various pools and pool paired against the $DEXTF token receive an extra bonus.
- 30% of Tokens to DEXTF-ETH pool
- 15% of Tokens to the sum of all XTF FUND-ANY tokens pools
- 55% of Tokens to the sum of all XTF FUND-DEXTF pools

Based on community feedback, this allocation might not necessarily be in the best interested of the protocol and your vote is required to vote this proposal to remove the bonus for pool paired against $DEXTF and effectively distribute the token evenly among the fund pools.

THE PROPOSAL
The daily allocation to be distributed as follows:
- 30% of Tokens to DEXTF-ETH pool
- 70% of Tokens to the sum of all XTF FUND pools
choices: Yes, I agree with the proposal
author: 0x9Eaf0E25Aa660557018847e71ED9cf9C7772cF77
